features: Contains: 1- 12 Ounce Bottle of Seaweed Bath Co. Hydrate Eucalyptus Peppermint Scented Body Wash. For a limited time, you may receive either bottle while we update our packaging. New Look, Same Great Product

Consciously created, we use a bounty of marine-derived ingredients - including nutrient-rich, sustainably harvested seaweed - to infuse your skin and hair with the unending power and benefits of the ocean

Let a wave of nourishing hydration wash over you. This replenishing body wash delivers essential moisture, with vitamin-rich blue green algae and a nourishing blend of Hawaiian kukui oil and coconut oil so you'll be ready for whatever drifts your way

All Seaweed Bath Co. products are made with natural, marine-derived ingredients. We’re Leaping Bunny certified, cruelty free, vegan, gluten free, paraben free, sulfate free and packaged in post-consumer recycled plastic

We embrace the nourishing magic of the ocean in everything we do at Seaweed Bath Co. From sustainably harvested seaweed to the endless gifts of the sea, our natural and effective products energize, inspire and restore
body.description: Product Description Unlock the magic of the sea with Seaweed Bath Co. Hydrate Body Wash. This body wash is made with sustainably harvested Atlantic seaweed and vitamin-rich blue green algae plus a nourishing blend of Hawaiian kukui and coconut oils to leave skin silky smooth. Inspired by the idea that nature already knows, we started with a centuries old remedy - seaweed baths - while on a personal journey to find a better troubled skin solution. Since then, Seaweed Bath Co. has continued to use sustainable practices to unlock the nourishing and restorative gifts of the ocean, harnessing its benefits in every product we make. We proudly support ocean conservation through partnerships with marine mammal rescue and rehabilitation organizations From the Manufacturer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice body wash
reviews.reviewText: I am really enjoying this body wash. I have been using hand made bar soaps for a while and just wanted more hydration, especially with winter around the corner. Scrolling through and saw this and checked it out. Good ingredients and decent reviews, I decided to try it. I am extremely pleased with its performance. Great scent and not overpowering. The body wash leaves me feeling perfectly hydrated and I don’t get that oily feeling on my skin a few hours after bathing. I would definitely recommend it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Other uses: facewash, getting itchies off...
reviews.reviewText: As others have commented, this smells wonderful, feels wonderful, is moisturizing, and all around a fabulous product. I even use it to wash my face and find that it is non-drying. My family and I all use this stuff whenever one of our cats rubs itchies (from prowling outside in the tumbleweeds or nettles) all over our face; I believe this is evidence of its detoxifying effect.Oh, and I absolutely agree with someone else's comment about the marketing changes. The older bottle look was FAR more appealing. In fact, it was one of my favorite marketing designs for all products, one I've even taken clues from for my own marketing. The new design is blah.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My new go to. My staple! My I can’t live without! The smell, the nourishment it provides. It’s the best. Everyone in my house tries to steal it. My absolutely fav! The product, the ingredients, the benefits-every bit of amazing. I bought 4 products in the line and cannot ever imagine being without them. My skin has never looked better!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What I like about this body wash is everything. At first I didn't really know because it was the first time using it at first I thought it didn't really feel moisturizering enough but it turns out it's fine im 60 something so it's working for me the smell is not strong and it lathers good I'm on my second bottle now had to try another sent im always changing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It has an amazing fragrance.
reviews.reviewText: This is my bottle that I have bought and I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well but not a game changer. Good brand and ingredients.
reviews.reviewText: After using this for a couple months, I have a few specific comments but I haven’t noticed anything particularly groundbreaking or noteworthy about the product itself. I do however like the ethics of the brand as a whole (vegan, cruelty free, sustainability, transparency) as far as what I can tell from their marketing and a brief google search. I did do a lot of research into the ingredients and I found that they are a lot better than most other body soaps. A lot of other skincare products claim to be “un scented” or “fragrance free” while still having a bunch of other irritating perfuming ingredients like high concentrations of essential oils etc. Since this product is unscented, the smell is kind of a weird earthy/oceany smell that I’m assuming is because of the seaweed. I didn’t like the smell at first, but it’s not very strong and as far as I can tell it doesn’t linger on the skin. My family didn’t notice any weird smell after I started using it at least. It’s possible that this also means it’s not as deeply cleansing as I feel like recently I’ve started to get smelly slightly quicker than I used to, but it’s also getting very hot where I live which may be the only culprit for that.I have a problem with dry legs especially when shaving and it’s gotten a lot better ever since I started using a new set of products. I can’t give all the credit to this as I’ve also been using different lotion and shave cream, but I do think that it’s a helpful factor as a body soap that’s not harsh and doesn’t strip the skin.I don’t have particularly sensitive skin so I can’t speak much to that, but I haven’t gotten any irritation using this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Softens skin, but smells like a cross between industrial shop-floor cleanser, and bug spray.
reviews.reviewText: The rosemary mint and eucalyptus mint scents are very pungent, and not in a good way. Bearable, but definitely not engaging scents. Perhaps it is the combinations used.Seaweed is known to have many hydrating and detoxifying benefits for skin. That is why I purchased this cleanser. It did clean well and left my skin feeling soft, not dried out.I was not allergic to any of the essential oils used to scent the product.Also, two bottles leaked slightly. Just enough to be annoying, but not enough to spur me to ship it back.The company needs to put an inner seal on the bottle under the cap.Amazon had wrapped the product very well, but jostling during shipping likely loosened the manufacturer's cap.I will buy the unscented next time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Subtle for Sensitive Skin, Smells Good
reviews.reviewText: I have incredibly sensitive and dry skin, despite that I still like my products to smell nice. I've wanted to try a seaweed product, plus this was a really good price for the ingredients so I decided to give it a try.The scent: I got citrus vanilla, it smells just like a pack of starburst candy, mainly the pink and yellow ones. I like, it's not a sugary sweet cloying scent but light and not too strong. The scent fills the shower when I use it, but doesn't linger on my skin after I rinse.Lather: Without a shower poof or something similar it pretty much doesn't lather. With just your hands you can get a light bubble but if you will go through a lot of product, with a poof a quarter size drop will get you plenty of thick suds for your entire body.It rinses clean, doesn't leave residue or scent.This is the first body wash I've found that doesn't leave my skin slightly dry or itchy. After rinsing my skin is soft and hydrated. Not enough so I don't need lotion, but enough that I'm not scratching later.Overall I like it and would buy again.Pros: Scent, smells like starburstsHydrating, doesn't leave me itchy (I have eczema)Lathers well with a poof, without you will need a bunch to get a light latherRinses without residue, doesn't leave scent on skinIngredient list is greatCons: You need a lot of product to lather, and the bottle isn't huge

I really enjoy showering with this gel. It washes well, rinses clean, and does not dry the skin. I used to buy this in the past, and kind of forgot for a while what a good and beneficial product this is, and ended up buying all sorts of fancy gels that didn't work half as well as this one does. Yes, it will be repurchased. I also bought the exfoliating body scrub "Awaken" - it's the perfect shower combo.
El aroma me gusto, es justo lo que estaba buscando además de que deja la piel muy suave.

reviews.reviewTitle: One of my top fav's now, want 100% recycled plastic tho
reviews.reviewText: My order finally came, this was second time trying to order it. I love the smell, my skin gets really moisturized and it's helped my eczema too. I would give this a 5 stars if it used 100% post consumer recycled plastic or zero plastic. There's also a couple ingredients I am unsure of, but most of them are good and nothing has irritated me. I'd also buy this in a bar soap if you made it!Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Divine smell of lavender and I love seaweed ever since surfing. It conditions skill really well
I love this body wash - it smells so good and is very hydrating
